Common Cold.definition: A viral infection affecting the upper respiratory tract.
Common Cold.treatment: Rest, stay hydrated, over-the-counter cold medications.

Flu.definition: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.

Allergy.definition: An exaggerated immune response to substances that are generally not harmful.

COVID-19.definition: A respiratory illness caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
COVID-19.treatment: Isolation, supportive care, seek medical attention if severe symptoms.

Pneumonia.definition: An inflammatory condition affecting the lung tissue.

Strep Throat.definition: A bacterial infection causing inflammation of the throat.

Gastroenteritis.definition: Inflammation of the stomach and intestines, often caused by infection.

Lyme Disease.definition: An infectious disease transmitted through tick bites.
